inputSpec.name: hbb_bed_file

inputSpec.help: bed file to calculate mpileup over the HBB gene

inputSpec.name: sced_bed_file
inputSpec.label: Sickle cell alleles Bed file
inputSpec.help: bed file to calculate mpileup over the SCED sickle cell alleles

inputSpec.name: min_MQ
inputSpec.label: samtools_mpileup_min_map_qual
inputSpec.help: Minimum mapping quality for an alignment to be used in mpileup (-q)

inputSpec.label: Minimum base quality for mpileup and varscan
inputSpec.help: Minimum base quality for an base to be considered (mpileup -Q and varscan --min_avg_qual)

inputSpec.label: mpileup summary calculations
inputSpec.help: run script to generate summary of the mpileup data, e.g. coverage, base calls at each position

inputSpec.help: Skip this step if not required

outputSpec.name: mpileup_file
